H0.text: Cell division occurs not only as organisms grow, but also as they reproduce.

H1.text: Proteins division occurs not only as organisms grow, but as they reproduce.

H2.text: Experimental division occurs not only as organisms grow, but also as they reproduce.

H3.text: Flight division occurs not only as organisms grow, but as they reproduce.

A4.text: For simple unicellular microorganisms such as the amoeba, one cell division is equivalent to reproduction â€“ an entire new organism is created.

A5.text: Mitotic cell division enables sexually reproducing organisms to develop from the one-celled zygote, which itself is produced by fusion of two gametes, each having been produced by meiotic cell division.
